Sequence Information.Peptide Name: PtesALF3 (PtALF3, Portunus trituberculatus anti-lipopolysaccharide factor isoform 3; natural AMPs; Crustaceans, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; BBS; PtesALF2, PtALF2)

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Recombinant fusion protein containing this peptide is active against bacteria (Liu Y et al., 2012) Gram- V. alginolyticus L59 (MIC 0.29-0.58 uM), P. aeruginosa P25 (MIC 0.29-0.58 uM), Gram+ M. luteus M2 (MIC 9.26-18.52 uM), S. aureus S7 (MIC37.04-74.09 uM), and fungus P. pastoris GS115 (MIC 4.63-9.26 uM).PtesALF2 (PtALF2) has the same amino acid in the ref.Recombinant production:bacteria:Escherichia coli: has been expressed in inclusion bodies, prufied and refolded for antimicrobial assays. Expression is induced by IPTG. UPdated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Liu Y, Cui Z, Luan W, Song C, Nie Q, Wang S, Li Q.2011
Literature Information.Title: Three isoforms of anti-lipopolysaccharide factor identified from eyestalk cDNA library of swimming crab Portunus trituberculatus
